title: Page analyzer input schema
description:
Input for page analyzer:
1.  Url of a website to be analyzed
2.  Keywords to be searched for

url.title: Website url
url.description: Url of a website to by analyzed

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords to be searched for during analysis
prefill: Oscar Winning Films: AJAX and Javascript
A Girl in the River: The Price of Forgiveness
default: Oscar Winning Films: AJAX and Javascript
A Girl in the River: The Price of Forgiveness

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: You will need to use Apify proxy or custom proxies.
proxyConfig.sectionDescription: How the browsers will behave during the scraping process.
